51551.summary: Some customers in the Westboro area of Sherwood Park are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51551.title: July 13 - Sherwood Park (Westboro) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
